page.title: 05Alsagers Bank
page.content: Alsagers Bank is still a small village in the midst of open fields. Neat Victorian terraced houses, an occasional detached house, a rest home and six bungalows for old people line the High Street. Modern bungalows, a small council estate and twelve bungalows for the elderly are situated off the Drive. The village has its own Primary School. It has few shops and the population relies heavily on transport to reach larger centres. There are still buses, but in recent years most families have beome car owners.
